DOC.brief_summary: For HIV-infected individual highly resistant virus , high drug level may require block virus . This study investigate concept compare efficacy standard fosamprenavir/ritonavir increase dose boost fosamprenavir combination fosamprenavir ( increase dose ) /lopinavir/ritonavir .
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study 908/RTV Combination With Other PIs Treatment Multi PI-Experienced HIV Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Multiple proteaseinhibitors experience HIV1 infected individual experience virological failure 's virus fully resistant boost fosamprenavir boost lopinavir base genotypic resistance test . Exclusion criterion : No full resistance FPV/r LPV/r Planned use NNRTIs part study salvage regimen Application additional exclusion criterion determine physician .
